defaultSeo.title: Daniel Broderick | Data Engineer
defaultSeo.description: Daniel Broderick is a Data Engineer, experienced in creating beautiful and functional websites and web applications.

heroData.paragraph: But I dabble with a bit of everything.

aboutItems: Academic background in Computer Science, Biology, Genetics, Statistics.
I'm a Data Engineer based in Washington DC.
I work at NCBI on the Sequence Read Archive, a ~50PB database of genetic sequencing datat.
I'm a pragmatist and I love to learn.
In my free time I like to be active! I was a varsity swimmer for eight years; I also enjoy hiking, lifting, and chilling on the beach. Of course, my favorite thing to do is tinker online.
aboutData.resumeParagraph: You can check my resumé in the link below.
